Name: tha-groupfromthesoc-la
Author: Group From The Society Of Graduates Of Thai Universities And Institutes

Translations.Text: pen sing smkhwr nı kar thi chan ca mi klaw keiyw kab xallxhˌ nxkcak khwam cring theanan thæcring chan di na hlakthan cak phracea khxng phwk cea mayang phwk cea læw dangnan cng sng wngswan xis rx xil pi kab chan theid
khea klaw wa hak than di na hlakthan dı «ma k cng na man ma theid hak than xyu nı hmu phu phud cring
læw khea di yon mithea khxng khea pi læw thandı man k khux ngu chad «
læa khea di chak mux khxng khea xxk læw thandı man k khaw kæ brrda phu thi mxng du kan
brrda bukhkhl chan na cak pracha cha ti khxng firˌ xea n di klaw wa thæcring phu ni khux nak mayakl thi rxbru
khea txngkar thi ca khab li phwk than xxk cak phændin khxng phwk than dangnan phwk than ca chı hı tha sing dı
phwk khea klaw wa cng prawing khea læa phi chay khxng khea wi kxn læa cng sng khn pi rwbrwm nı meuxng tang «
phwk khea k ca na mayang than sung nak mayakl thuk khn thi rxbru
læa brrda nak mayakl kdi ma yang firˌ xea n doy klaw wa nænxn phwk rea ca txng di rangwal tha phwk rea pen phu chna
Khea klaw wa chı læw læa thæcring phwk than nan ca di xyu nı hmu phu kıl chid
phwk khea klaw wa xo mu sa than ca yon kxn hrux wa phwk rea ca pen phu yon kxn
khea klaw wa phwk than cng yon kxn theid khran meux phwk khea di yon xxk pi phwk khea k lwngta prachachn læa thahı phwk khea klaw læa phwk khea nan di na ma sung mayakl xan hıy hlwng
læa rea di mi xo ngkar kæ mu sa cng yon mithea khxng cea læw thandı man k klun sing thi phwk khea lwngta wi
læa khwam cring kdi keid khun læa sing thi phwk khea kratha kan khun k tk pi
læw thi non hæla phwk khea kdi rab khwam phay phæ læa klay pen phu tatxy
læa brrda nak mayakl k thuk thahı lm taw lng krab (doy khwam cring)
